description.0: This longsword is as silent as the mysterious ocean depths. It is even more ancient than its stylings might imply.

0.0: When using an Elemental Skill, ATK will be increased by <cryo>12%</cryo> for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 25% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, a maximum of <cryo>150</cryo> ATK will be gained based on <cryo>2.4%</cryo> of the total amount of the Life Bond cleared, lasting for 15s.

1.0: When using an Elemental Skill, ATK will be increased by <cryo>15%</cryo> for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 25% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, a maximum of <cryo>187.5</cryo> ATK will be gained based on <cryo>3%</cryo> of the total amount of the Life Bond cleared, lasting for 15s.

2.0: When using an Elemental Skill, ATK will be increased by <cryo>18%</cryo> for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 25% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, a maximum of <cryo>225</cryo> ATK will be gained based on <cryo>3.6%</cryo> of the total amount of the Life Bond cleared, lasting for 15s.

3.0: When using an Elemental Skill, ATK will be increased by <cryo>21%</cryo> for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 25% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, a maximum of <cryo>262.5</cryo> ATK will be gained based on <cryo>4.2%</cryo> of the total amount of the Life Bond cleared, lasting for 15s.

4.0: When using an Elemental Skill, ATK will be increased by <cryo>24%</cryo> for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 25% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, a maximum of <cryo>300</cryo> ATK will be gained based on <cryo>4.8%</cryo> of the total amount of the Life Bond cleared, lasting for 15s.
